# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class

# Temporary files and directories
temp/
*.tmp
*.log
*.bak

# Python virtual environment
env/
venv/
*.egg-info/
.Python

# PyInstaller
/build/
/dist/
*.spec

# Ignore specific files
application_icon.ico

# Ignore OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Ignore IDE/editor settings
.vscode/
.idea/
*.sublime-project
*.sublime-workspace
